name: Pure
content: We like to smoke it for the medication
This that Kush we call it
Get so high I get so high
I be smoking all the time
The store it's from the weedman
Roll it up don't give a f**k
Thought I had a problem went
Even used to get in trouble
To school high be the last man
All these plants you would think
Even though it's against the rules
We like to smoke it for the medication
I be rolling hella w**d up
I be chiefing all day like
I be hoping that my locks
Even went really hard with the wax man
F**k it every now and then
If you can't roll a joint
Smoke so much you would think
Got so much OG Kush I could pile it man
On the boat I get high like a pilot man
Learn the rules check the pack
Roll it up light it up
We like to smoke it for the medication
